Operating directly under the National Command Authority, an unknown entity of warriors carefully selected high-risk missions. They are the Tier 1 operators.

More than 2 million soldiers, sailors, airmen and Marines in uniform. Of these, approximately 50,000 are under the control of Special Operations Command. The functions of the Tier 1 operators beyond those of Special Operations Forces best trained. Their exact number can be counted by tens and are experts in violence. The new Medal of Honor is inspired and has been developed with the elite Tier 1 operators. The players put on their boots these warriors and apply their unique skills against a new enemy in the most hostile and inhospitable land of Afghanistan.

There is a new enemy. It's a new war. There's a new warrior. He is the Tier 1.

Fighting in a war now Elite Special Forces that fight using the tactics detailed Tier 1 Operators with brute force Rangers Corps.

Unprecedented Authenticity: A strong story with a pace and a variety of settings in the rugged Afghanistan, creating a gaming experience only seen in Medal of Honor.

Online multiplayer redefined: Developed by the renowned team at DICE (makers of Battlefield Bad Company 2) offers a fast-paced combat, tactical warfare perfect blend of depth and action
